form.xslt: <!-- Return year(s) with max sale --> <xsl:transform xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" version="2.0"> <xsl:template match="/"> <xsl:variable name="max" as="xs:integer" select="max(for $y in /company/year return sum($y/quarter/@sales))"/> <xsl:copy-of select="/company/year[sum(quarter/@sales) = $max]"/> </xsl:template> </xsl:transform>
